themes: grant eligibility tied to cash budgets
lack of support for non-producing organizations
affordability crisis for artists and musicians
threat to cultural identity due to displacement
key_phrases: we are often overlooked because of our smaller cash budget
grants and funding opportunities are not directed toward our efforts
we support artists and do not produce artistic content
musicians and artists affordability must be addressed
arts remain center to our identity
barriers_identified: funding opportunities based on cash budget rather than value of donated services
exclusion of service organizations that do not produce artistic content from grants
increasing unaffordability for low-income artists and musicians
solutions_proposed: affordability must be addressed to ensure that arts remain center to our identity
